replies.body: Its terrible if you ask me. They said am but that literally leaves a 10 hour gap of "am" pretty disgusting if you ask me

> [{quoted}](name=TGblindshot,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=y4P1JBwP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-06-26T13:42:46.633+0000)
>
> Its terrible if you ask me. They said am but that literally leaves a 10 hour gap of "am" pretty disgusting if you ask me

You’ve waited 2 weeks from announcement, I’m sure you can wait a few more hours.

Also, with luck, no issues. OCE TFT worked perfectly
THAT’S the important part too in my opinion! I’m so relieved to hear that it worked well in OCE I’m willing to wait to get the same results in NA! :)

> [{quoted}](name=TGblindshot,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=y4P1JBwP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-06-26T13:42:46.633+0000)
>
> Its terrible if you ask me. They said am but that literally leaves a 10 hour gap of "am" pretty disgusting if you ask me

LMAO, calm down person. 
IT'S STILL AM ON THE EAST COAST.
Entitled people....
Riot does all time in PST, so its only 8:00am and 4 more possible hours before release.
All we know is that they are working on it and didn't give us a start time in order to prevent ~~crash~~ clash.
Do I need to relog when they activate it though or can I just stay in the client logged in waiting for it to activate
I would guess you would most likely have to relog in. I'm assuming there will be a small micro-patch that you have to install to actually activate the game mode.

There was a small update of like 180MB during the time when they said the servers would be off for maintenance. But that was it.
180MB isn't a lot........and then like 30minutes later the servers were back on.

They said the maintenance would be 3hrs. :/

> [{quoted}](name=FQVBSina,realm=NA,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=y4P1JBwP,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-06-26T13:53:53.566+0000)
>
> Do I need to relog when they activate it though or can I just stay in the client logged in waiting for it to activate

I think it's going to force restart but I might be wrong.
You guys know that you can chill your beans with Dota underlords while waiting for Teamfight Tactics right?

> [{quoted}](name=Thaorkan,realm=EUW,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=y4P1JBwP,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2019-06-26T20:49:04.725+0000)
>
> You guys know that you can chill your beans with Dota underlords while waiting for Teamfight Tactics right?

We can play it without battle pass? It was a closed beta last time I checked.

> [{quoted}](name=Sathelight,realm=EUNE,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=y4P1JBwP,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-06-26T21:40:00.140+0000)
>
> We can play it without battle pass? It was a closed beta last time I checked.

Yup open beta available on Steam for free

> [{quoted}](name=Thaorkan,realm=EUW,application-id=RaE1aOE7,discussion-id=y4P1JBwP,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2019-06-26T21:51:26.371+0000)
>
> Yup open beta available on Steam for free

Wow, thx for the info! Time to visit my Dota friends then :)

Imagine if Riot linked TFT to Arcade Pass or restricted the mode to lv 30 accounts... People would cry but you'd still have a chance to play the game.
The title is a statement not a question.
That is a question. This is  statement.

No, it's not. Since, in text, we don't have access to vocal inflection, simply having why in the statement doesn't make it a question. Afterall, I just said why twice, and neither of these are questions.
